text:
Amy Lyall | March 15, 2018

The proud dad opened up about his new life as a parent in front of the crowd at his latest concert.

Enrique Iglesias speaks about his twins for the first time

Enrique Iglesias speaks about his twins for the first time 00:05:10

Enrique Iglesias and Anna Kournikova shocked the world when they welcomed twins Nicholas and Lucy in December.

Since the twins arrived the notoriously private couple have kept a lot of their new family life under wraps, apart from a couple of sweet shots on social media.

But on Tuesday night the 42-year-old singer spoke about his twins for the first time and opened up in a gushing on stage speech in Budapest.

"I love them so much"

“I became a father about 12 weeks ago, and I can absolutely tell you, two things: Love my babies! I love them so much,” Enrique told the crowd.

“Actually, three things: I love my girl, and I super f*cking love you guys for being here tonight!” he continued.

The sweet moment was captured on video by a fan in the crowd.

It’s clear that the Escape singer is absolutely besotted with his children and adores his new life as a dad.

The couple shared the first photos of their twins earlier this year. Source: Instagram

Their sunshine

Enrique and Anna have been together for 16 years but are notoriously private when it comes to their relationship and are rarely seen together in public.

The couple officially confirmed that they had welcomed their son and daughter a month after they were born when they both took to social media to share sweet snaps of the bubs.

Both the singer and the former tennis ace captioned their posts: “My Sunshine.”

In 2017 there was a lot of speculation that the pair had tied the knot after Anna was seen sporting a large diamond ring and matching eternity band on her wedding finger.

But in an interview months later Enrique explained that despite the length of time they’d been together, the couple have no plans to get married.

The singer explained they already live the life of a married couple in a lot of ways.
